snippet: A woman fatally shot on a man’s porch in suburban Detroit was hurt, scared and confused hours earlier when she crashed her car into a parked car, a witness testified.
abstract: Witness testifies that Renisha McBride, who was shot by Theodore Wafer in suburban Detroit, was hurt, scared and confused hours before the shooting; judge is holding a hearing to determine whether there is enough evidence to try Wafer on a second-degree murder charge.
lead_paragraph: A woman fatally shot on a man’s porch in suburban Detroit was hurt, scared and confused hours earlier when she crashed her car into a parked car, a witness testified.

headline.main: Michigan: Witness Gives Details in Inquiry Into Porch Killing
headline.print_headline: Michigan: Witness Gives Details In Inquiry Into Porch Killing
